titles.title: Stop the Theft of Our Social Security Numbers Act
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to prohibit tax- related mailings from disclosing in any public way an individual's social security number.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Social Security.

bill.summary: 9/4/1997--Introduced. Stop the Theft of Our Social Security Numbers Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to restrict disclosure of an individual's social security number by the Department of the Treasury.
